author: intrepid42
body:
#### PR description:

Add options in BiasedTauDecayer for filtering tau->electron or muon decays only.

#### PR validation:

See original PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/31304

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/31304
title: PythiaTauDecayHook: filter for tau to electron or muon decays (10_6_X)
